articles.title: Fully vaccinated Americans will be able to vacation in the EU this summer, European Commission president tells New York Times - CNN
articles.description: Americans who have been fully vaccinated against Covid-19 will be able to visit the European Union this summer, Ursula von der Leyen, president of the European Commission, said in an interview with The New York Times on Sunday.
